# Positioning Statement

## For (Target Customer)
- [ ] Describe the ideal customer.

## Who (Need/Problem)
- [ ] What problem are you solving for them?

## Our Product/Service
- [ ] What is your product/service?

## Unlike (Competitors)
- [ ] What makes you different from the competition?

## We (Benefit)
- [ ] What key benefit do you offer?
